Right now, the only thing I do want is evveryone's opinions on which 
characters are perfect - not hot to improve them YET.  

The only reason I am wanting to slow down discussion is I am trying to 
keep the discussion going year-round, as opposed to covering all 
topics within 2-3 months.  Why do I want that?  If anyone new shows 
up, that person can tell this group has a fairly steady discussion of 
gladiator.
